nodes.bodyText:
I noticed that I had a mistake in the previous schema..
secondary index should be key+value not index per column (btree)
Also, role_id fk shouldn't be index but constraint only..
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,9 +3,7 @@ CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `zms_server`.`role_tags` (
   `key` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
   `value` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
   PRIMARY KEY (`role_id`, `key`, `value`),
-  INDEX `fk_role_tag_role_idx` (`role_id` ASC),
-  INDEX `tag_key_sec_idx` (`key` ASC),
-  INDEX `tag_value_sec_idx` (`value` ASC),
+  INDEX `tag_key_val_sec_idx` (`key` ASC, `value` ASC),
